Description.Text: Guests coming from Roissy-Charles de Gaulle should take the regional train service of the RER, Line B towards Saint-Rémy-les Chevreuses and get out at the station Gare du Nord. From there, take the RATP bus service, number 54 for Gabriel Péri and get out at the stop Anvers Sacré Coeur. The total journey time, including changes, comes to 55 minutes. Those arriving from Orly Airport should take the RATP bus service Orlybus towards Denfert-Rochereau, getting out at Denfert-Rochereau. From there, take the metro train service, line 4 towards Porte de Clignancourt and get out at Barbès-Rochechouart. The total journey time, including changes, comes to some 55 minutes. Guests arriving by metro should take line 12 towards Porte de la Chapelle/Mairie d'Issy and get out at the stop Abbesses. Change to line 2 and head for Porte Dauphine/Nation, getting out at Anvers. Those coming by bus should take the number 30 bus or the number 54 bus and get out at the stop Anvers. The hotel is only 100 m away.

For the stays from 1 to 3 nights inclusive, the daily housekeeping is included in the proposed rate (short stay) and for long stays the housekeeping is every 7th day. Cots are available on request, subject to availability and for a fee to be paid on the spot.

This popular residence comprises a total of 76 lodgings throughout the main building and the annexe building. Guests may make use of the foyer with 24-hour reception desk, a hotel safe (charges apply), a lift and a small garden. Those arriving by car may take advantage of the car park. A laundry service rounds up the facilities on offer.
